title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1069/1999 of 25 May 1999 adapting to scientific and technical progress Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91 (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1069/1999
of 25 May 1999
adapting to scientific and technical progress Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91
(Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3922/91 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 May 1999.
For the Commission
Neil KINNOCK
